mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_student where rownum <= 20 order by student_no asc

select student_no stuNo, department_no departNo, student_name stuName, rpad( substr(student_ssn, 1, 8 ) , 14, '*' ) stuSsn, CASE WHEN student_address IS NULL THEN '***주소 미상*** ' ELSE substr(student_address,0,10) || '...' END stuAddress, to_char(entrance_date,'yyyy/mm/dd') entDate, absence_yn absYn, coach_professor_no coachProfessorNo from tb_student order by student_no asc
